title: mAna hIna
sahitya:
mAna hInanigabhimAnavEke


anupallavi

  jnAnavilladavange guru bOdhEyEke


caraNam 1    kADoLage tiruguvage kanaka bhUSaNavEke ODOLoge timbuvage harivANavEke 
bEDidare koDadihage kaDu binkatanavEke pADalariyadavange preLaDhatanavEke
    caraNam 2    ambaliyanumbavage amrtAnnavadEke kambhaLiya hoDevavage maDiyEtake 
DombATkikkuvage gAmbhIrya tanavEke hambalanu biDadavage hari nAmavEke
    caraNam 3    bHusurara koluvavage bhUri dharmagaLEke bhASe geTTavage nambugEyatake 
klEsha oDaloLigiralu tIrtta yAtregaLake Ase biDadiddavage sanyAsavEke
    caraNam 4    mitimIri naDevavage vrata nEmagaLu Eke satige aLukuvana sAhasavu Eke 
mati shuddhiyilladA mantra tantragaLEke gatiya cintisadavana vipratvavEke
    caraNam 5    sAmAnyanige sArvabhauma padaviyadEke prEmavillada bandhu janavEtake 
svAmi shrI purandara viTTalana neneyadiha tAmasAdhamanige kaivalyavEke
